Summary:
The CL and EL team meetings are summarized in files using the Markdown format.
Here is the summary of the meeting:

CL:
- The Merge testnet has been activated on devnet. 
- There were no major issues reported during activation.

EL:
- The execution layer's merge implementation was reviewed by the team, with some minor changes suggested for improvement.
- The CL and EL teams are working together to resolve any remaining issues before mainnet deployment.

Mainnet/Devnet Status: Mainnet is still on Prater (Merge-enabled), while devnet has been activated.
